ai-patthana12.4:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.4:0.3_0: perceptions that are attached to things, calm, etc.
ai-patthana12.4:1.1_0: We won’t go to the teaching for refuge ...
ai-patthana12.4:2.1_0: We’re not able to teach the Dhamma for someone else, or to give rise to a teaching. ...
ai-patthana12.4:4.1_0: for not getting enough cloth to teach.
